articles.title: How to 'film' a reindeer in your home this Christmas with McDonald's app - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The Reindeer Ready Live app lets parents capture footage of Santa’s reindeer as they stop off at the house on Christmas Eve
articles.content:

articles.title: Gorka Marquez beams as he steps out with Gemma Atkinson and daughter Mia for first time after Strictly - OK! magazine
articles.description: Strictly Come Dancing star Gorka Marquez has stepped out with his parter Gemma Atkinson and their daughter Mia for the first time since the hit BBC show final on Saturday.
articles.content:
